程序包 model

类 ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ModelFacade
  • public class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    The facade of all the database, logic, computation related modules

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.lang.String getCachedEntry​(java.lang.String word)
      Retrieve the data describing the given word either from database.

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      If the given word has been stored in the cache before, the data will be return, otherwise an empty string will be returned.
      java.lang.String getWordFromAPI​(java.lang.String word)
      Retrieve data from the API with a given word input.

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      If the response from the API is not NULL, it will update the entry in the database about the word given.

      Determine if the given word input has been stored in cache or not.

      Postconditions:

      send the email from the given account to a given email address.

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      An email will be sent from the emailFrom to emailTo.
      void updateDB​(java.lang.String word, org.json.simple.JSONObject info)
      Update the data describing the given word into the database.

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      If the given word has been stored in the cache before, the data will be return, otherwise an empty string will be returned.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ModelFacade

        public ModelFacade​(HTTPManager manager,
                   Database db)
        Constructor.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        参数:
        manager - An instance of the HTTPManager class. Must not be NULL
        db - An instance of the Database class. Must not be NULL

    • 方法详细资料

      • hasCached

        public boolean hasCached​(java.lang.String word)
        Determine if the given word input has been stored in cache or not.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None.
        参数:
        word - The given word from user input.
        返回:
        true if the given word has been stored in cache before, false otherwise.

      • getCachedEntry

        public java.lang.String getCachedEntry​(java.lang.String word)
        Retrieve the data describing the given word either from database.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        If the given word has been stored in the cache before, the data will be return, otherwise an empty string will be returned.
        参数:
        word - The given word from user input.
        返回:
        the data about hte given word input in the form of String retrieved from database.

      • updateDB

        public void updateDB​(java.lang.String word,
                     org.json.simple.JSONObject info)
        Update the data describing the given word into the database.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        If the given word has been stored in the cache before, the data will be return, otherwise an empty string will be returned.
        参数:
        word - The given word from user input.
        info - The text describing the word in the form of JSONObject, will need the Decoder to decode it.

      • logIn

        public boolean logIn​(java.lang.String apiId,
                     java.lang.String apiKey)
        Verify and then set the apiId and apiKey field of the instance.

        Preconditions:
        The apiId and apiKey must be valid and matching
        Postconditions:
        return false if the authentication fails, otherwise true.
        参数:
        apiId - The given api id to verify.
        apiKey - The given api key to verify.
        返回:
        true if logged in successfully, false otherwise.

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail​(java.lang.String apiKey,
                         java.lang.String emailTo,
                         java.lang.String emailFrom,
                         java.lang.String emailReply,
                         java.lang.String targetName,
                         java.lang.String signature,
                         java.lang.String subject,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         java.lang.String replyName)
        send the email from the given account to a given email address.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        An email will be sent from the emailFrom to emailTo.
        参数:
        apiKey - the api key of the SendGrid email address.
        emailTo - The email address you want to use to send the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        emailFrom - The email address you want to use to send the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        emailReply - The email address you want to use to receive the reply form the receiver, may not be NULL or Empty.
        targetName - The name of the person who receive the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        signature - The name of the person who send the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        subject - The subject or title of the email to send.
        value - The content of the email to send.
        replyName - The name of the person who receive the reply from the receiver, may not be NULL or Empty.
        返回:
        true if email sent successfully, false otherwise

      • getWordFromAPI

        public java.lang.String getWordFromAPI​(java.lang.String word)
        Retrieve data from the API with a given word input.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        If the response from the API is not NULL, it will update the entry in the database about the word given.
        参数:
        word - The given word from user input.
        返回:
        The data about the given word input in the form of String retrieved from the api.
